CustomField.description: Indicates whether this status is the default status (true) or not (false). Beginning with API version 39.0, there must be a default CampaignMemberStatus defined for every campaign
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether this status is the default status (true) or not (false). Beginning with API version 39.0, there must be a default CampaignMemberStatus defined for every campaign
CustomField.label: Default
